title: Monster Mash the Fash
subtitle: Dance party fundraiser for Defend Migrants Alliance
ticketInfo:
Sliding scale, now or at the door.

description:
ðŸ”¥ðŸ§Š Join us for a dance party in collaboration with local DJs and vendors, raising funds to support migrants in detention! ðŸ”¥ðŸ§Š

As political violence and surveillance escalate, we refuse to be silent, and we refuse to stop supporting one another.

This event is a celebration of our resistance and the need to be loud and unwavering in our fight to protect everyone in our community.

Â Join us for a night of having fun and building community in the face of fascism, featuring:Â 

*   political education
    
*   a raffle
    
*   pumpkin smashing
    
*   live music from DJ Camisoul, DJ Arkipelago, and DJ Mo Mami!
    

Proceeds will go to [@tanggolmigrantemovement](https://www.instagram.com/tanggolmigrantemovement/) to defend and support the rights and welfare of migrants and their families in the wake of increased persecution and violence.
